unnormalised: Crop insurance, yaar, is it worth the hassle? Heard mixed stories from farmers in Maharashtra. Premiums are rising, claim process is slow. My uncle Kishan got a payout last year on 20/05/2023, but took months! Is Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana really helping? Should we explore options like ICICI Lombard? Needs a serious look at 16:00 hrs on 10/11/2024. Rs. 20,000 per hectare is a big chunk. I'll ask around in the village after Diwali on 04/11/2024. Jai Kisan!
normalised: Crop insurance, yaar, is it worth the hassle? Heard mixed stories from farmers in Maharashtra. Premiums are rising, claim process is slow. My uncle Kishan got a payout last year on twentieth may two thousand and twenty three, but took months! Is Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana really helping? Should we explore options like I C I C I Lombard? Needs a serious look at sixteen hundred hours on tenth november two thousand and twenty four. Rupee twenty thousand per hectare is a big chunk. I'll ask around in the village after Diwali on fourth november two thousand and twenty four. Jai Kisan!
